name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wandpen: A distraction free AI rewriter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly rewrite your emails, articles, LinkedIn posts, etc without changing tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Distraction-free AI writing assistant to help you writer smarter and faster.

How does it works?
・Select a sentence/ paragraph inside a text editor/ input
・Click on the Wandpen tooltip appears below the selection
・Use built-in prompts or write your own to polish your writing with AI

We have a generous free plan.

You can use Wandpen to improve your emails, fix grammar, rewrite your sentences to make it engaging, etc.

Feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions.
